title: Ticket #7554: Streamed output and error created 0777 if not present.
description: While testing unrelated work, I noticed that if you set stream_output or stream_error to a file which doesn't exist, the files are created mode 0755; if you don't stream them, they're create mode 0644, which seems a lot saner.
